Dining Out: A 2011 Look Ahead - US - January 2011
The future of dining out in 2011 is already being shaped thanks to trends, laws, economic factors and demographic tastes.
In this report, Mintel provides insight and ideation surrounding these factors for the restaurant industry. Issues of healthfulness, menu transparency, technology and seasonality shape how consumers interact with restaurants. As these issues develop further, they will continue to shape and reshape the industry, calling for new restaurant services, tools and menu innovation.
